title: RNAseq-fusion-nf pipeline parameters
description: This pipeline performs fusion-gene discovery from junction reads identified by STAR during alignment.

input_folder.description: Folder containing fastq files and STAR junction files

input_file.description: Input file (comma-separated) with 4 columns: SM(sample name), pair1 (path to fastq pair 1), pair2 (path to fastq pair 2), and junction (path to junction file)

suffix1.description: Suffix of 1st element of fastq files pair

suffix2.description: Suffix of 2nd element of fastq files pair

junction_suffix.description: Suffix of STAR chimeric junction files

starfusion_path.description: Path to STAR-fusion executable; note that the default is set to the location in the singularity container

cpu.description: Number of cpu used by bwa mem and sambamba

mem.description: Size of memory used for mapping (in GB)

junctions.description: Option to use STAR junction files already generated
